fields.description:
The broken behaviour occurs when you make window modal. I hide task bar so space is identical to non-modal window.
h4. Expected behavior
1. Click on the text field in empty area
2  Text insertion caret gets inserted at end of text
3. Keyboard comes up, and last line of text comes into view.

h4. Broken behaviour - Set Window modal: true, navBarHidden: true
1. Click on the text field in exmpty area
2. Text insertion caret gets inserted at end of text
3. Keyboard comes up, but last line of text does not come into view
fields.summary: iOS: Modal windows not calculate positions properly
